## verse-core package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [DetailInputStream](./verse-core.detailinputstream.md) | Stream for sending player details. see: [Player.onRequestDetailStream()](./verse-core.player.onrequestdetailstream.md) |
|  [DetailInputStreamFactory](./verse-core.detailinputstreamfactory.md) | Factory class for [DetailInputStream](./verse-core.detailinputstream.md)<!-- -->. see: [Player.onRequestDetailStream()](./verse-core.player.onrequestdetailstream.md) |
|  [Verse](./verse-core.verse.md) | <p>VerseEngine - Web-based Metaverse Engine on P2P overlay network.</p><p>To use this class, three classes must be implemented: [Player](./verse-core.player.md)<!-- -->, [OtherPersonFactory](./verse-core.otherpersonfactory.md)<!-- -->, and [OtherPerson](./verse-core.otherperson.md)<!-- -->.</p> |

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [init(module\_or\_path)](./verse-core.init.md) | If <code>module_or_path</code> is {<!-- -->RequestInfo<!-- -->} or {<!-- -->URL<!-- -->}<!-- -->, makes a request and for everything else, calls <code>WebAssembly.instantiate</code> directly. |
|  [initSync(module)](./verse-core.initsync.md) | Instantiates the given <code>module</code>, which can either be bytes or a precompiled <code>WebAssembly.Module</code>. |
